params.withdrawalAddress: - the address to withdraw funds to

CallerIsNotAdminOrOwner().notice: Caller must be the admin address

CannotSetZeroValue().notice: Admin has attempted to set a zero value

ZeroAddress().notice: Provided address cannot be zero address

getDiamondOwner().notice: Returns current owner of Diamond contract.

setCursedBondPercentage(uint256).notice: Sets the digging fee / cursed bond ratioThe denominator is 10000 used to calculate how much bond archaeologists must lock per curse.

setExpirationThreshold(uint256).notice: Updates the expirationThreshold used during sarcophagus creationDenominated in seconds

setGracePeriod(uint256).notice: Updates the resurrection grace periodDenominated in seconds

setProtocolFeeBasePercentage(uint256).notice: Sets the protocol fee base percentage, used to calculate protocol feesThe denominator is 10000

transferDiamondOwner(address).notice: Transfers diamond owner to new owner.

withdrawProtocolFees(address).notice: Withdraws the total protocol fee amount from the contract to the specified address

userdoc.notice: Caller of any function in this facet must be the admin address
